title: 211mph with the top down: what it's like to drive the Aston Martin DBS Superleggera Volante
text:
In about the same time as it takes to say Aston Martin DBS Superleggera Volante the fastest convertible ever built at the company’s Warwickshire factory will be barrelling down the road at mind-boggling speeds.

The name might be stretching a point – that’s Superleggera for super lightweight and Volante for convertible – but Aston’s new luxury sports car is the automotive equivalent of supercalifragilisticexpialidocious.

Devilishly debonair from every angle, the DBS packs prodigious power. Under that svelte, elegant bonnet sits a hand-built 5.2-litre V12 twin-turbo engine producing 715 bhp and capable of simply thrilling performance.

The convertible can achieve a heady 211mph top down and scorch...
description: In about the same time as it takes to say Aston Martin DBS Superleggera Volante the fastest convertible ever built at the company’s Warwickshire factory will be barrelling down the road at mind-boggling speeds.
